function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personal space in housing leading to stress and reduced well-being during quarantine.","Impact":"Increased stress and reduced well-being for individuals without sufficient personal space.","Mitigation":"Adopting flexible and adaptable home design technologies to create private spaces within housing units.","Technologies":"Adaptable home technology, movable partitions, modular furniture.","People":"Residents in housing units during quarantine.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, housing developers."},{"Description":"Scarcity of local reserves in residential complexes during quarantine, leading to supply chain disruptions and increased risk of virus spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of food and medicine shortages, supply chain disruptions, and spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Establishing self-dependent services within residential complexes, creating shorter supply paths, and improving local reserves.","Technologies":"Urban farming, local food production, on-site food and medicine supply, community gardens.","People":"Residents in residential complexes, local authorities, supply chain managers.","Owner":"Residential complex management, local authorities, urban planners."}]}
